isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - WEST COAST MAGNUM MIRRORS AND AERO MIRRORS - WEST COAST MAGNUM SERVICE PROCEDURES - MIRROR GLASS REPLACEMENT

step1.para: Locate the upper pinned locknut on the mirror head pivot rod. Make a reference mark on the mirror end plate at the roll pin location. This will provide a reference point when tightening the nut and re-installing the roll pin.
Using a 3/32" flat nosed punch, remove the roll pin from the upper pivot rod nut. Retain the pin for re-assembly.
Perform Steps 3 through 6 from Mirror Head Replacement to access the top plate of the mirror body.
Remove (2) Phillips head screws from the top plate.
Remove pivot rod nut (roll pin removed in Step 2) and washer. Remove top plate.
Grasp the top of the mirror glass and pull up until the seal is free from the body sides. Remove the glass from mirror body. Remove the seal from the glass.
On the reverse side of the mirror glass, locate and disconnect (2) spade connectors.
Install gasket to replacement mirror glass.
On the reverse side of the replacement glass, attach (2) spade connectors to the heating element.
Reverse Steps 1 through 6 to re-assemble mirror head.
